PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: According to eq 3 , the hole mobilities obtained are as high as 3.3 × 10^-3 and 4.4 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 for PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO , respectively.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Property Value" entities in the paragraph:

| Property Value |

| 3.3 × 10^-3 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |
| 4.4 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |

These are the values of the "hole mobilities" mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Of course! Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that refer to the "Value of material property":

| Property Value |
| --- |
| 3.3 × 10^-3 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |
| 4.4 × 10^-2 cm^2 V -1 s^-1 |

These are the values of the "hole mobilities" mentioned in the paragraph, which are material properties of the two materials (PzNDTDTBT and PzNDTDTBO) being compared.
